AssetWeeklyOpeningHoursPeriod

The opening Hours for Monday

Field Required Type Description

hours

optional Array<AssetOpeningHoursPeriod> See AssetOpeningHoursPeriod for more information.

isSpecial

optional boolean

Define if the hours comes from a special opening hours day.

Example 

{
  "hours": [
    {
      "start": "06:30",
      "end": "18:00"
    }
  ],
  "isSpecial": false
}
